CustomField.description: Displays the SOP Payment Type ID/Code that matches the value of Payment Type.
CustomField.formula: CASE( PaymentTypeName__c , "Cheque", "1", "Credit/Debit Card", "2", "Bank Transfer", "4", "Worldpay", "5", "No Payment", "6", "Cash", "7", "Foreign Cheque", "8", "On Site Payment", "9", "CC Surcharge Only", "102", "Dashboard", "103", "NA")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the SOP Payment Type ID/Code that matches the value of Payment Type.
CustomField.label: SOP PaymentTypeID
